page.title: 17OAKLANDS COLLEGE:ST.ALBANS
page.content: { {Oaklands College}is a college of agriculture and horticulture. About{ {430}students attend part-time and{140 attend full time. The students learn about farming and about growing {flowers, fruit}and{vegetables.}The students who learn about farming work at Oaklands Farm and learn how to use machinery. They learn the latest {methods}of looking after farm animals and the best way to{grow crops}like wheat and oil rape. Students learning about{horticulture}grow tomatoes and cucumbers in green houses. They also look after{apple}and{pear}orchards. They learn how to pack and sell flowers}and{vegetables.}
